snippet: For Elizabeth Williams, a courtroom illustrator who has spent more than three decades depicting famous criminals through her drawings, the job is a study of character.
abstract: For Elizabeth Williams, a courtroom illustrator who has spent more than three decades depicting famous criminals through her drawings, the job is a study of character.

headline.main: Capturing on Canvas the Downfall of Wall Street's Criminals
headline.print_headline: Capturing on Canvas the Downfall of Wall Street’s Criminals
